Bash(__NEW_LINE_fbdad024bcaf19e8__ python3 -c "
from PIL import Image
img = Image.open\(''/Users/damifiance/Documents/Lumen-AI.jpg''\)
bg_color = img.getpixel\(\(0, 0\)\)
square = Image.new\(''RGB'', \(1024, 1024\), bg_color\)
x_offset = \(1024 - img.width\) // 2
y_offset = \(1024 - img.height\) // 2
square.paste\(img, \(x_offset, y_offset\)\)
square.save\(''$TMPDIR_ICON/icon_1024.png''\)
print\(f''Background color sampled: {bg_color}''\)
print\(''Done''\)
")
